# General Information

```{r acqvalab1, echo=F, fig.cap="", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, out.width='100%'}
knitr::include_graphics("https://slcladal.github.io/images/acqvalab.png")
```

The materials for this workshop are available at https://martinschweinberger.github.io/acqvatabletree/

## Timeline

**Part 1: Working with tables in R (10-11:30)**

Break (11:30 - 12:30)

**Part 2: Tree-based models (12:30-14:00)**

This workshop consists of two parts and it is aimed at beginners and intermediate users of R.

Part 1 showcases how to work with and process tabulated data (tables) using R.
